# `RestErrorDetail` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| error | `string` | Yes | name of the error |
| details | `string` | No | additional information regarding the error |
| userParams | [`UserParam[]`](userparam-definition.md) | No | parameters to be inserted into details. |
